headline: Does Tesla (TSLA) Still Justify Its Price After Recent Valuation Checks?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tesla's current share price still makes sense after years of headlines and debate about its potential, this article walks through what that tag on the ticker might really mean for you. Tesla shares last closed at US$431.44, with returns of a 1.8% decline over 7 days, an 11.7% decline over 30 days, a 1.5% decline year to date, 3.9% over 1 year, 198.7% over 3 years and 49.8% over 5 years, which sets up an interesting backdrop for any valuation discussion. Recent...
